channel.title: Randomly not working
channel.description:
i was playing my client with my friend and then i randomly disconnect with him still playing. i reload the client and then it just starts to not work. i haven't touched the source or client files. i reload the server and now nobody can connect. ive restarted router. ive even tried my hamachi client. nothing please help ill rep++ and ill even give you admin on my server i dont care ill pay you as long as you can help get it back up
EDIT: just checked canyouseeme.org and now my ports are randomly closed?????????? help!
